amendment.description: To modify the functions of the Privacy and Civil Liberties Oversight Board, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3821 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice.

action.text: Amendment SA 3821 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Harkin. (consideration: CR S10215; text: CR S10215) To modify the functions of the Privacy and Civil Liberties Oversight Board, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3821 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3821 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Harkin.
